name: Sylvarcon 2049: A Cybersecurity Aventure
description:
Lazarus Era.

It is the year 2049. After a series of devastating pandemics in the 2020s, millions have died with each new wave of viruses. While institutions rushed to implement emergency countermeasures, entire economies collapsed, and governments were overthrown and then replaced by pharma mega-corporations.
Arising from the ashes emerges a singular corporation empowered to manage the strains of viruses and control the citizens effectively.

The Lazarus system was designed to address the law and monitor each citizen's state of health to ensure individuals' safety within quarantined cities around the world. Its algorithms will select vaccine-worthy citizens and maintain the new status quo.

Choose your player character: Hacker or Forensic Analyst.

Claire is a digital forensics expert who desperately wants to know the truth about what happened to her mother; Ethan is an expert hacker who wants to find out why his brother was murdered. Both will struggle to discover the truth through real-life challenges of their specialty.

Real environments where to practice cybersecurity.

This game allows players to learn real hacking techniques and digital forensics analysis in both instances. This video game features and includes real challenges developed by cybersecurity experts that will allow players, through a virtual machine, to experience and resolve challenges in a real environment.

Learn cybersecurity with Sylvarcon:2049.

Sylvarcon 2049 will allow you to learn and practice basic and advanced techniques while developing a unique story that immerses the player in a new and unique platform. We have combined all the power of Unity with virtual machines that will deliver an unprecedented learning experience and practice cybersecurity within an exciting video game.
